name: Triplex Components-Lib Web v.7.0.0
description:
Triplex Components-Lib Web


Official SberBusiness Design System

Component Library.

Release 7.0.0


What’s New?


Added:

  • Tabs Folder
  • Skeletons


Modified:

  • Alert Context
  • Buttons
  • Modal Window Confirmation
  • Suggest


How to Use?

  • You can link Colors, Typography, Styles, and Icons from this library to the relevant SberBusiness library files here.
  • You need to download and install the SB Sans Interface font family to edit text content in the components. Alternatively, you can change all fonts to Roboto. 
  • Use the advanced Variants setup to manage library components.
  • To learn more about using components and styles, see Descriptions.
